alert.note: Alert for Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 07 at 3:13AM CDT until April 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Bayfield County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
